
# Preparing and Loading your data into R

Intro

## Prerequisites

The prerequisites for this tutorial are `tidyverse`. If this package isn't installed, you'll have to install it using `install.packages()`.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("tidyverse")
```

Load the packages when you're done! If there are errors, you may have not installed the above packages correctly!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Finally, you will need to obtain the sample data...
